answers.answer: Hello,The exact cause of this blister can be confirmed only after a complete medical history and clinical examination. It may be a manifestation of some allergy, inflammation or infection. It can be a bacterial skin infection called impetigo. Are your blood glucose levels norrmal? Skin problems are common in people with diabetes mellitus. The exact cause can be determined only after a physical examination. If it is impetigo then a topical antibacterial will help. Do see a dermatologist. I hope it helps.Best luck and regards!

question: 1 have a sore and water blister on the bottom of my leg
title: dermatology
